song_lyrics: Nehā lagā so lagā, lagā nā chhūṭeve, ṭek.
Nehā lagā Ghanshyām piyāsu, jyu hīro foryo na fūṭe. Nehā... 1
Lāgat lāgat lāg gayā he, kāhukā torāyā na tūṭe. Nehā... 2
Shir sāṭekī bāt banī he, sab jag mil shir kūṭe. Nehā... 3
Premānand Hari charan kamalko, nihshank hoi ras lūṭe. Nehā... 4
title: Nehā lagā so lagā lagā nā chhūṭeve

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1177: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Murtina Pad
